document.full_text: a federal appeals court ruled wednesday that a 9-year-old boy living in brazil should be returned to his american father, but the verdict is likely to be appealed.
document.title: the americas: brazil: court sides with u.s. father
lines_and_colors: a federal appeals court ruled wednesday that a 9-year-old boy living in brazil should be returned to his american father, but the verdict is likely to be appealed.
